description: Excavation of a basement beneath the mews, part rear courtyard and rear part of main property; removal of rear additions at lower ground, ground and first floor levels and new extension at rear second floor level; landscaping to rear courtyard with external staircase and balcony at ground floor level; (site includes 9 Belgrave Mews North)
